name: Alternating Unilateral Rest-Pause (~8 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: Alternate sides to near failure, minimal rest between sides => ~8 min total per exercise
overview_and_execution: Choose a unilateral exercise. Perform reps to near-failure on one side, switch to the other, and keep alternating until both sides reach failure. Increase load once you exceed your target rep total (e.g., 20 reps/side).
example_application: Single-Arm Dumbbell Press: Start with 40 lbs for 10 reps each arm. Alternate arms to near-failure. If you can surpass 20 reps total per arm, move to 45 lbs next session.
important_notes: Include a deload week if progress stalls; reduce load and rebuild.
